ygData.subject: The Autobot Council
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Okay everyone, I am really letting the creative juices flow here. If some of this dosent work with your characters or stories in the RPG, just say that it

Subject: The Autobot Council
References: <3B00DDD3.32483.C5EBF63@localhost> <3B0169C4.26250.E817BC8@localhost>

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

OOC: Okay everyone, I am really letting the creative juices flow here.
If some of this dosent work with your characters or stories in the RPG,
just say that it is a different time than which your character came
from. :) Also all the Autobots in this scene have been remade smaller
for fuel reasons. Also for a note, Ironhide has been remade from the
Matrix, and due to his history, he is one of the main characters.  Here
we go.


BIC:
The massive iron doors Pacifix walks up too open up, the gears grinding,
and it leads into an enormous chambre, well light by energon powered
lights. The room is a large dome, with many chairs and tables where a
hundred Autobots sit. Most of the Autobots were given this high
privelage for the name they made during one of the great wars. Painted
all over are the symbols of Maximal, Predacon, and Autobot. In the
centre, over the highest stand, is a large image of the Autobots
greatest Hero, Optimus Prime. All along the walls there are pictures of
legends who have ceased to exist, and died for the cause. Brawn's face
is at one end, Ratchet and Prowl at another, Ironhide at one corner,
surrounded by many Autobots that preexist them. One though, that is very
famous, Alpha Trion. In the centre of all the podiums is an energon
fountain. It harmoneusly gushes a soft pink energy, that gives the room
a light pink colour.

There is a large hush over the crowd, as a red old Autobot, at the top
and centre of the room stands up. He then begins to speak, and the other
Autobots follow his every word. "Greetings Pacifix" he says in a rough
deep voice. The Autobot Ironhide's voice can be heard by all. He speaks
with wisdom, and kind words. To his right and left, standing behind him
are Sunstreaker and Sideswipe, his body guards. To his right sitting
down is his peer, the old Autobot known as Kup, who watches all of this
with an unussually sense of calmness. Beside him is the once human, now
robot Spike. A few more recognizable Autobots sit around. "As you know"
Ironhide continues, "We have finally achieved what we set out to
millions of years ago. Peace" he says, every robot in the room nodding
at the last word. "But it is an uneasy peace, for even though we have
all but stopped the Decepticons, we have reasons to believe their
decendants, the Predacons, do not follow this peace willfully" he says
in a grave tone. "We even have strong evidence that points to the fact
that they have released Decepticon war Criminals from confinment, to try
to change time on the planet Earth" he says, thinking back to that time,
four million years ago, when the Ark, and Nemesis crash landed on the
planet, bringing to it their million year Strugle. He remembers the
battles they had there, and how it helped turn the tide of War for the
Autobots. "We sent a scouting ship to earth already, with two Autobot
Veterans. They have not made contact with us however, and their ship is
not emmiting a signal. We fear the Predacons may be on to us. That is
why we have summoned you Pacifix. The Predacons will not notice if a
rookie commander goes missing, but we have reason to believe you are the
perfect leader for this mission. We also know that one of your friends
was in that scout ship, and understand you will most likely want to
retrieve him. We have faith in your Pacifist reasoning, and think you
would best represent us. We have already selected a few Autobot veterans
to go with you, and we understand you are also putting a crew of you own
together" Ironhide says, pausing for Pacifix to respond.
